org.bk.ass.sim

Interface Simulator.Behavior

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ApproxAttackBehavior, AttackerBehavior, HealerBehavior, RepairerBehavior, RetreatBehavior, Simulator.RoleBasedBehavior, SuiciderBehavior
    Enclosing class:
    Simulator

    public static interface Simulator.Behavior
    Implementations define what action to take for an agent in regards to its allies and/or enemies.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean simUnit(int frameSkip, Agent agent, UnorderedCollection<Agent> allies, UnorderedCollection<Agent> enemies)
      Simulate the given agent.

    • Method Detail

      • simUnit

        boolean simUnit(int frameSkip,
                Agent agent,
                UnorderedCollection<Agent> allies,
                UnorderedCollection<Agent> enemies)
        Simulate the given agent. Returns true if the agent was active (including waiting), false if the agent won't be able to do anything anymore.
